word_mean: 蠓，蚋：摇蚊科的双翅小昆虫，多数可致叮螫痛，有些为奥-曼森线虫 (Mansonella ozza-rdi)和常现棘唇线虫(Dipetalonema perstans)的媒介

sentence.Network_en: Midge clapped her hands, calling them back to order.
sentence.Network_cn: 米奇拍手示意他们安静下来。

sentence.Network_en: Reggie reacted with the same affronted horror Midge had felt.
sentence.Network_cn: 雷吉的反应是又羞愤又害怕，和米奇的感觉一样。

sentence.Network_en: Midge couldn't quite put her finger on the reason.
sentence.Network_cn: 米吉还不能十分确定原因何在。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 研究报告指出，其中有保存状态良好的双翅目摇蚊（midge），这只蚊子在有生之年，可胼曾亲眼目睹恐龙。克莱顿或许便是以此为蓝 …
大学英语精读第6册 ... microscope 显微镜 midge 蚊, 侏儒 likely to milieu 周围, 环境.
蠓（midge）属于双翅目、蠓科（Ceratopogonidae）的昆虫，俗称“墨蚊”、“人咬”。种类繁多。
●中国人就要这样记单词●_英语_天涯部落 ... 【log】 希腊词根：讲话，学说 【midge】 (蠓虫) 【in】 词缀表“向内”，即【内】.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English mycg(e), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch mug and German Mücke, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin musca and Greek muia 'fly'

entry.def: Midges are very small insects which bite.

means.word_mean: 1. minute two-winged mosquito-like fly lacking biting mouthparts; appear in dancing swarms especially near water
